services.name: Balinese hand massage
services.description: This massage helps to get rid of tension, pain and improves blood circulation, your skin will look fresher and better. Our therapists use reflexology to increase the effectiveness of your hand massage. This can be a great way to increase the health benefits of it. This massage is especially good in combination with other procedures.

services.name: Shiatsu
services.description: Shiatsu is Japanese for “finger pressure”; it is a type of alternative medicine consisting of finger and palm pressure, stretches, and other massage techniques. It is a way of helping people to relax and cope with issues such as stress, muscle pain, nausea, anxiety, and depression. Shiatsu is performed on a futon mat, with clients fully clothed. Shiatsu will involve deep breathing, rotating and stretching your joints, as well as manipulating pressure points. When these points are pressed, people describe the sensation as feeling tender, tickling, intense, or slightly uncomfortable, unlike anything else. Shiatsu is both preventative and healing, so getting it done on a regular basis, along with stretching, exercise, and a healthy diet, may improve your health.

services.name: Thai Massage
services.description:
Thai massage has its roots in a spiritual tradition, and its purpose is to heal a person physically, emotionally and spiritually.

You start by laying on your back, and the therapist uses gentle compression and stretching techniques to open up your body, beginning with you legs. Some people say Thai massage is a little like doing yoga without any effort, because the therapist will push your body into various positions without any work on your part.

Thai massage is both deeply relaxing and energizing.

services.name: Bali pearl
services.description: This is the program for rejuvenation and hydration of the body (absolutely perfect for dull and dry skin). During this procedure the expansion of pores and the excretion of toxins takes place. Vitamin complex A, B1, D and E brings a rejuvenating effect, the skin becomes soft, silky, fresh and well hydrated.

services.name: Bali Legend with oils
services.description: You can choose the oil yourself among traditional Balinese oils with different flavors.  This is a traditional procedure, which routes from the royal families of Java Island. The procedure has traditionally been considered obligatory for the Balinese bride before the wedding to make her skin soft, smooth, fragrant and sensitive. Men like this spa-program too!

services.name: Fish SPA
services.description:
In our salon you can enjoy a unique spa-treatment for your skin with special Garra-Ruffa fishes. This kind of fish cleans the top layer of skin, thereby promoting skin renewal and relieves it from dark spots.

Thanks to a professional cleaning and filtration system sterility of water is guaranteed, and the possibility of transmitting skin diseases is completely excluded. This kind of fish don’t have teeth, so your skin will be very carefully cleaned. After this spa Your skin will become soft and well-groomed as a special enzyme contained in saliva moisturizes the skin.

In “Bali” spa you can make a fish peeling not only of the legs, but of the whole body.

Also this type of massage have beneficial effect on the nervous system, relieves fatigue and swelling in the legs.

services.name: Olive Massage
services.description: An Olive massage uses a combination of gentle stretches, acupressure and olive lotion to stimulate the flow of blood, oxygen and “qi” (energy) around your body, and bring deep relaxation and wellness. Olive massage uses a variety of techniques including skin rolling, kneading and stroking, acupressure and reflexology; essential olive lotion with grape oil will regenerate your skin, make it soft and silky.

services.name: Balinese head massage
services.description: During the Balinese head massage the head, neck and face are massaged with the purpose of manipulating energy channels. The goal is to clear blocks in these energy channels that cause a build-up of negative energy that are purported to cause ailments. The belief is when the energy does not flow properly, negative energy builds up, causing common ailments, including stress, pain and aches, and baldness or hair loss. This type of massage helps to clear up your mind and improves blood circulation, bringing more oxygen to your brain.

services.name: Creol  massage
services.description: Сreol massage is used to bring mental relaxation. It has good efficiency in overweight and anticellulite treatment. During the massage it is used ethnic songs and special oil with wheat sprouts, almond and rose. Special warm bamboo sticks filled with seeds are in line with contours of your body and renew energy balance. Creol massage is good in mental and physical overwork.

services.name: Body mask
services.description: The mask softens, nourishes and moisturizes skin, relieves irritation, stimulates regeneration and rejuvenates the skin, brings antioxidant, immunomodulating action, activates cell renewal. Mask strengthens blood vessels, blocking free radicals, smoothes out wrinkles.

services.name: Hot stone massage
services.description: Hot stone massage is a special massage during which the therapist uses smooth, heated stones, either as an extension of their own hands, or by placing them on the body while they massage other parts of the body. The heat can be both deeply relaxing and help warm up tight muscles so the therapist can work more deeply, more quickly. The therapist uses many stones of various shapes and sizes — big ones on the big muscles, smaller ones on smaller muscles. He might also leave heated stones in specific points along your spine, in the palms of your hand, on your belly, or even between your toes to improve the flow of energy in your body. A hot stone massage, however, takes a lot of skill and sensitivity on the part of the therapist. Our therapists from Bali will please you with the best style which they learned on Bali.

services.name: Padakarna
services.description: It is well-known that special points on feet and ears are directly related to various organs and body parts. Reflexology is an ancient technique that allows you to activate these special process and in a natural way to awaken the inner healing power. The package includes: ears and feet reflexology, back and shoulders relaxing massage.

services.name: Strawberry cream massage
services.description: Massage with strawberry cream is an antistressed massage which combine aromatherapy of strawberry cream. Its curative treatment takes off tension and renews working capacity. During massage all your troubles are disappeared. Also strawberry cream is very useful to your skin, because it includes natural acids, Omega-3, A and B vitamins. Light and relaxed massage gives you an opportunity to enjoy nice strawberry smell and have a good mood.

services.name: Chocolate relax-massage
services.description: Chocolate massage is one of the most pleasant massage and great cosmetic treatment. It includes massage, psychotherapy, lymphatic drainage, aromatherapy and other cosmetic treatments directed to improving metabolism. Caffeine, which is a part of chocolate, helps metabolic processes, nourishes your skin, makes it soft and smooth. Also caffein helps to fight cellulite and small parts of cocoa beans make soft peeling. General relaxation during this delicious treatment with chocolate smell helps to get out off negative, improve your mood, normalize blood circulation and rejuvenate your body.

services.name: Herbal bags massage
services.description:
Aroma warm bags containing a combination of the finest herbs and seaweed are gently massaged into the body. This process reconditions and rejuvenates your skin by gently exfoliating the outer layers, and nourishing deep within. Each component of the bag can affect every area of the body.

The steam from the bag is absorbed by the skin and inhaled. It is believed that toxins are removed from the body via the perspiration caused by the heat. You will feel the smell of calming chamomile, detoxifying peppermint and stimulating fennel.

masters.name: Miss Kay
masters.sertificate: Top Master Kay has been working in our salon for over two years. She always finds a special approach, sensing the individual needs of each. It has extremely positive energy. You will never forget your impressions of a massage session with Kay.

masters.name: Miss Pat
masters.sertificate: Work experience - 2 years in Thailand. In addition to his professional skills, Pat invests a part of his soul during a massage session. The master is focused on the result of maximum comfort for you. Pat knows how to relieve you of back pain and make massage beneficial to your body. Taking into account your benefits will help you relax and recharge.

masters.name: Miss Vari
masters.sertificate: Vari graduated from one of the best schools in Thailand. She worked in large salons of her native country, as well as had practice in Korea and China. Once you have a session with this master, you will be able to feel all the splendor of Thai massage and worthy to appreciate Vara's professional skills.

masters.name: Miss Pon
masters.sertificate: Pon is a master who has been learning and refining, having studied various massage techniques for many years. Pon also mastered the Thai spa program course. According to her, only going to the spa program can truly relax your body and soul, relax and rejuvenate your skin. Once you have a massage session with this master, you will feel an incredible influx of energy and energy throughout the day!

masters.name: Miss Mack
masters.sertificate: Mack has more than 1 year of experience in Turkey. She always hears your wishes and will make a massage session an unforgettable procedure for your body. Thanks to his skills, Mack will help to relieve fatigue, relieve tension and relax. Likewise, the master will ensure that your body recovers and feels an influx of strength and energy. From the first seconds, the master attracts with his smile and incredibly positive energy.

masters.name: Miss Fon
masters.sertificate: Work experience - 1 year In Thailand. Massage at the Masters Fon is a therapy for your body. During the procedure, the master carefully crafts each zone. Fon has strong enough hands that will allow you to fully experience the full benefits of Thai massage. If you are a master at relaxing massages, it will overwhelm your body with care and love.

masters.name: Miss Yao
masters.sertificate: Yao is a very friendly and positive master in our salon. She has strong enough hands and she is always taught and committed to work 100%. If you would like more attention on some parts of your body, tell us about it and enjoy a massage. Yao is great at all kinds of massages, as well as energizing every guest and every employee of our salon with his positive energy.

masters.name: Miss Aom
masters.sertificate: Aom has many Thai massage techniques. Has more than a year's experience in Thailand. It delicately senses the needs of each client. It has a special talent for finding problematic places on the human body and helps to cope with problems, so that you feel lightness in the body, an inflow of strength and energy.

masters.name: Miss Woon
masters.sertificate: Wool's strong hands will help your body reboot. You will be able to get the vigor you need for a long time. She is very responsible and diligent in her work. Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of Thailand with our master Woon.

masters.name: Miss Wang
masters.sertificate: Wang has good experience. It will help remove fatigue from your body. You will forget about the bustle of the city during its massage, and afterwards you will come with a feeling of renewed vitality.

masters.name: Miss Pattita
masters.sertificate: Miss Pattita has acquired her professional skills for 4 years in the spa of her native Thailand. Thanks to the experience and talent, the client's body is well felt and can help to cope with problems. Her massage skills will help you feel better.

messages.name: Ira
messages.message: The best salon in the city!)

messages.name: Luna
messages.message: Salon me very, you are the best.
